attributes.action: Undertake an Interview with Russell Brand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petiton for Gordon Brown to be interviewed by Russell Brand.

The self confessed rock'n'roll Timmy Mallett often talks about a glorious revolution and the signers of this petition demand that the Prime Minister gives him the opportunity to discuss his ideas in a live debate.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
